&nbsp;

Hello LET community,

**IT'S CYBER WEEKEND SALE AT ALWYZON IN VIENNA, AUSTRIA!**

Grab the chance and get a small virtual server in Austria starting at just 15,– €/year! From 26.–29.11 you can either pick between the affordable EcoServer series or the latest generation Virtual series. The EcoServers are exclusively available through this event and limited in stock. Although the EcoServers run on slightly older hardware, they are connected to the same low-latency network and you can expect the same features as with all our other offers!

&nbsp;

| <center>**EcoServer 1536**<br/> **15,–** €/year</center> | <center>**EcoServer 3072**<br/> **25,–** €/year</center> | <center>**Virtual Server XS**<br/>~~41,88~~ **35,–** €/year</center> |
|---|---|---|
| ✓ **1536 MB** DDR4 ECC Memory<br/>✓ **1 vCore** Xeon® E5-2680v3<br/>✓ **15 GB** SSD Storage (RAID 10)<br/>✓ **1000 Mb/s** Up- and Downlink<br/>✓ Located in Vienna, AT<br/>✓ 1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6 included<br/>✓ 5 TB Monthly Bandwidth | ✓ **3072 MB** DDR4 ECC Memory<br/>✓ **1 vCore** Xeon® E5-2680v3<br/>✓ **30 GB** SSD Storage (RAID 10)<br/>✓ **1000 Mb/s** Up- and Downlink<br/>✓ Located in Vienna, AT<br/>✓ 1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6 included<br/>✓ 5 TB Monthly Bandwidth | ✓ **2048 MB** DDR4 ECC Memory<br/>✓ **2 vCore** AMD® EPYC® (2ⁿᵈ Gen)<br/>✓ **25 GB** NVMe Storage (RAID 10)<br/>✓ **1000 Mb/s** Up- and Downlink<br/>✓ Located in Vienna, AT<br/>✓ 1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6 included<br/>✓ 20 TB Monthly Bandwidth |
| <center>No Coupon Required</center> | <center>No Coupon Required</center> | <center>Coupon: `CYBERWEEKEND21`</center> |
| <center>[**[[ ORDER NOW ]]**](https://www.alwyzon.com/get/eco-1536)</center> | <center>[**[[ ORDER NOW ]]**](https://www.alwyzon.com/get/eco-3072)</center> | <center>[**[[ ORDER NOW ]]**](https://www.alwyzon.com/get/cyberweekend21)</center> |

_Each offer is limited to 100 orders or the latest of 2021-11-29. All prices are recurring discounts and exclusive of VAT. Your local VAT rate may be added on top of these prices depending on your location._

&nbsp;

## Key Features
✓ Instant provisioning of new servers
✓ Easy to use client area (reboot, reinstall, VNC console)
✓ Reverse DNS configurable over client area too
✓ AlmaLinux, CentOS. Debian, OpenSUSE or Ubuntu pre-installed
✓ Or: upload and install your own ISOs in the client area
✓ Powered by KVM and the latest Dell & Juniper hardware
✓ Located at the InterXion campus in Vienna, Austria
✓ Low-latency network in the heart of Europe
✓ Redundant, UPS-backed power supply
✓ Generators with initial autonomy of 72 hours

&nbsp;

## About Alwyzon

[Alwyzon](https://www.alwyzon.com), is a trading name of Hohl IT e.U., a small privately-owned software development company registered in Graz, Austria and a full member of the RIPE NCC. All equipment runs on our own infrastructure at the InterXion campus in Vienna, the largest internet hub in Austria. The network is connected directly to the Vienna Internet Exchange (VIX), the Neutral Internet eXchange of the Czech Republic (NIX.CZ) and the Neutral Internet eXchange of Slovakia (NIX.SK). International traffic is handed off as transit traffic through RETN and Voxility.

&nbsp;

## About the Network

Thanks to our central location within Europe and thanks to over [120 peerings](https://bgp.he.net/AS40994#_peers), the Alwyzon network can help you to reach low latencies through most parts of Europe. Peerings range from local ISPs (in AT 🇦🇹, BA 🇧🇦, CH 🇨🇭, CZ 🇨🇿, DE 🇩🇪, HR 🇭🇷, RS 🇷🇸, SI 🇸🇮 & SK 🇸🇰), major data centers (Amazon, Anexia/Netcup, Hetzner, M247, OVH & more) to various content networks (Cloudflare, Fastly, Facebook & more).

Try it yourself:
• Looking Glass: https://www.alwyzon.com/lg/vie
• Test IPv4: 86.106.182.189
• Test IPv6: 2a0d:f302:106::6
• Test Download File: [100 MB](https://lg.vie.alwyzon.net/100MB.test), [1 GB](https://lg.vie.alwyzon.net/1GB.test)

&nbsp;

## Frequently Asked Questions

**What payment methods do you support?**
You can pay via Credit Card (Mastercard, VISA, American Express), BanContact, EPS, giropay, iDeal, P24 and Paypal.

**How long until my virtual server is ready to use?**
Provisioning of new virtual servers is fully automated and takes about 5 minutes. As soon as your payment is received, the setup process is immediatley launched for the operating system you selected during checkout. (Provided that our system didn't flag you for manual review.)

**What kinds of usages are accepted?**
In short: keep it legit and don't abuse the provided resources. No email spam, no file sharing, no Tor nodes, no Torrent and nothing that will max out the shared resources 24/7 (= no crypto currency miners, please). For a more detailed list, see the “Accepted Usage Policy” section of our [Terms of Service](https://www.alwyzon.com/terms).

**What operating systems are supported?**
You can either pick from the latest AlmaLinux, CentOS, Debian, OpenSuse or Ubuntu releases pre-installed on your virtual server; or you can upload any ISO and install whatever operating system you would like to use instead.

**What level of support is provided?**
These are unmanaged virtual server offers, so you are expected to install and configure the server yourself. You get root access to the virtual server and a Linux distribution pre-installed, but you will have to setup any software according to your requirements.

**Can I have a benchmark?**
Yes, of course; this is LET after all. :)
